channel.title: Game crashed when trying to continue a save after adding a mod
channel.description: I have put many hours into a save and wanted to add another mod to that save but it keeps crashing when I try to continue from my last save. The game launched perfectly fine but crashes when I try to continue. I can create a new save perfectly fine and it doesn't crash. I've tried to delete the mod then continue but it still crashes. It only does this when I try to add a mod to an existing game. I really don't want to start over again. PLS HELP!! I'll attach a pic of the crash report. ![ERROR|690x374](upload://4QgH3ncVidGMnq3wawAQhwlR6DL.png)

item.title: Game crashed when trying to continue a save after adding a mod
